verses.text_plain: Hear the word of the Lord, ye children of Israel: for the Lord hath a controversy with the inhabitants of the land, because there is no truth, nor mercy, nor knowledge of God in the land.
verses.verse_html: 1Hear the word of the Lord, ye children of Israel: for the Lord hath a controversy with the inhabitants of the land, because there is no truth, nor mercy, nor knowledge of God in the land.

verses.text_plain: By swearing, and lying, and killing, and stealing, and committing adultery, they break out, and blood toucheth blood.
verses.verse_html:
2By swearing, and lying, and killing, and stealing, and committing adultery, they break out, and blood toucheth blood. ▼
▼ blood: Heb. bloods

verses.text_plain: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
verses.verse_html: 3Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.

verses.text_plain: Yet let no man strive, nor reprove another: for thy people are as they that strive with the priest.
verses.verse_html: 4Yet let no man strive, nor reprove another: for thy people are as they that strive with the priest.

verses.text_plain: Therefore shalt thou fall in the day, and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night, and I will destroy thy mother.
verses.verse_html:
5Therefore shalt thou fall in the day, and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night, and I will destroy thy mother. ▼
▼ destroy: Heb. cut off

footnotes.body_html: ▼ destroy: Heb. cut off

verses.text_plain: My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge: because thou hast rejected knowledge, I will also reject thee, that thou shalt be no priest to me: seeing thou hast forgotten the law of thy God, I will also forget thy children.
verses.verse_html:
6My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge: because thou hast rejected knowledge, I will also reject thee, that thou shalt be no priest to me: seeing thou hast forgotten the law of thy God, I will also forget thy children. ▼
▼ destroyed: Heb. cut off

tokens.text: thee, that thou shalt be no priest
to me: seeing thou hast forgotten

footnotes.body_html: ▼ destroyed: Heb. cut off

verses.text_plain: As they were increased, so they sinned against me: therefore will I change their glory into shame.
verses.verse_html: 7As they were increased, so they sinned against me: therefore will I change their glory into shame.

verses.text_plain: They eat up the sin of my people, and they set their heart on their iniquity.
verses.verse_html:
8They eat up the sin of my people, and they set their heart on their iniquity. ▼
▼ set…: Heb. lift up their soul to

footnotes.body_text: ▼ set…: Heb. lift up their soul to
footnotes.body_html: ▼ set…: Heb. lift up their soul to

verses.text_plain: And there shall be, like people, like priest: and I will punish them for their ways, and reward them their doings.
verses.verse_html:
9And there shall be, like people, like priest: and I will punish them for their ways, and reward them their doings. ▼
▼ punish: Heb. visit upon
 , ▼
▼ reward: Heb. cause to return

tokens.text: And there shall be, like people

footnotes.body_html: ▼ punish: Heb. visit upon
▼ reward: Heb. cause to return

verses.text_plain: For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 10For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
verses.verse_html: 11Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.

verses.text_plain: My people ask counsel at their stocks, and their staff declareth unto them: for the spirit of whoredoms hath caused them to err, and they have gone a whoring from under their God.
verses.verse_html: 12My people ask counsel at their stocks, and their staff declareth unto them: for the spirit of whoredoms hath caused them to err, and they have gone a whoring from under their God.

tokens.text: and they have gone a whoring

verses.text_plain: They sacrifice upon the tops of the mountains, and burn incense upon the hills, under oaks and poplars and elms, because the shadow thereof is good: therefore your daughters shall commit whoredom, and your spouses shall commit adultery.
verses.verse_html: 13They sacrifice upon the tops of the mountains, and burn incense upon the hills, under oaks and poplars and elms, because the shadow thereof is good: therefore your daughters shall commit whoredom, and your spouses shall commit adultery.

verses.text_plain: I will not punish your daughters when they commit whoredom, nor your spouses when they commit adultery: for themselves are separated with whores, and they sacrifice with harlots: therefore the people that doth not understand shall fall.
verses.verse_html:
14I will not punish your daughters when they commit whoredom, nor your spouses when they commit adultery: for themselves are separated with whores, and they sacrifice with harlots: therefore the people that doth not understand shall fall. ▼
▼ I will not: or, Shall I not
 , ▼
▼ fall: or, be punished

footnotes.body_text: ▼ I will not: or, Shall I not
footnotes.body_html: ▼ I will not: or, Shall I not
▼ fall: or, be punished

verses.text_plain: Though thou, Israel, play the harlot, yet let not Judah offend; and come not ye unto Gilgal, neither go ye up to Beth–aven, nor swear, The Lord liveth.
verses.verse_html: 15Though thou, Israel, play the harlot, yet let not Judah offend; and come not ye unto Gilgal, neither go ye up to Beth–aven, nor swear, The Lord liveth.

verses.text_plain: For Israel slideth back as a backsliding heifer: now the Lord will feed them as a lamb in a large place.
verses.verse_html: 16For Israel slideth back as a backsliding heifer: now the Lord will feed them as a lamb in a large place.

verses.text_plain: Ephraim is joined to idols: let him alone.
verses.verse_html: 17Ephraim is joined to idols: let him alone.

verses.text_plain: Their drink is sour: they have committed whoredom continually: her rulers with shame do love, Give ye.
verses.verse_html:
18Their drink is sour: they have committed whoredom continually: her rulers with shame do love, Give ye. ▼
▼ sour: Heb. gone
 , ▼
▼ rulers: Heb. shields

verses.text_plain: The wind hath bound her up in her wings, and they shall be ashamed because of their sacrifices.
verses.verse_html: 19The wind hath bound her up in her wings, and they shall be ashamed because of their sacrifices.
